Name: Mousebound
About the game: Mousebound is an unforgiving game of unique controls, patience, and discovery. Play in a 3D world, using a 2D system. Move your character by placing your mouse cursor in the direction you want to go. Progress and explore 4 unique levels. Gain progress, but be prepared to lose progress. Frequently. Discover new levels and your limit of frustration. Upload custom images to use as your playable character. Unlock different items for customization. Freedom awaits you at the finish line. With inspiration from Super Monkey Ball and Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy.
